title: EU to Internet giants: Drop extremist content in an hour
text:
EU to Internet giants: Drop extremist content in an hour 10:08am EST - 00:45 
The European Commission has told firms like Google and Facebook to remove extremist content - such as Islamic State propaganda - an hour after it is first notified, or face legislation forcing them to do so.   
The European Commission has told firms like Google and Facebook to remove extremist content - such as Islamic State propaganda - an hour after it is first notified, or face legislation forcing them to do so.  //www.reuters.com/video/2018/03/01/eu-to-internet-giants-drop-extremist-con?videoId=405277603&videoChannel=14073
